synopsis.text: As a high school student, Anzu Hoshino's life is simple and satisfying, filled with video games, an abundance of chocolate, and the company of her cherished cat. Romance is the last thing on her mind, until an unexpected magical intervention propels her into an alternate reality. This new world is devoid of her beloved indulgences, but instead, she finds herself surrounded by attractive young men. To return to her cherished routine, Anzu reluctantly partakes in this unfamiliar world, forming an unlikely bond with Tsukasa Katsuki, the most captivating boy in her school. As she navigates through a series of orchestrated romantic encounters, Anzu discovers that there may be more to these handsome strangers than she initially thought. Can she maintain her resolve to avoid romance in this peculiar world, or will she succumb to the charm of her new surroundings?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
